JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Office worker job available in Skjern
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job duties and responsibilities 
We are looking for a skilled office worker with experience in: answering telephone calls and taking messages, sorting and delivering incoming mail and send outgoing mail, scheduling appointments and receiving customers or visitors, providing general information to staff, clients, or the public, typeing, formating, or editing routine memos or other reports, collaborating with other team members to meet production goals.

Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by sending their application or calling +45 88448244 during our office hours: Monday-Thursday 9:00-15:00 and Friday 9:00-13:00.

Job requirements
A minimum of 2 related experience - ideal working with different nationalities.
Flexibility, strong sense of responsibility, good attention to details and quality consciousness.
English skills: medium level required.

Qualifications
Driver's license required: B.
A relevant vocational education or apprenticeship is an advantage.

Eurojob Denmark may provide assistance for registration to SIRI, SKAT, BorgerService, and all the other authorities.
